title: The Harvester
description: He was a humble farmer until a drought ravaged his land. Now, he’s found a new crop… human organs! He is The Harvester!
altHero: an old farmer wearing a big hat and holding a scythe
alt1: dead tree with a crow on a branch, a tumbleweed goes by
alt2: the farmer is angry with red eyes, doom clouds billows in the background
alt3: through a cabin window, a human heart flies by
alt4: a rolling cooler being pulled through the misty night
